name: Colorize (itch) (HardJoe)
description:
Description

When some troops from another planet comes to your forest, what would you do? Of course you shoot some bullets at them! But this time, there's a twist. Each troop has their own color and you have to adapt to the situation. You are a dinosaur that can change colors and shoot some bullets to protect your habitat.

Diversifiers
  • Into the Spider-Verse: Dinosaur can swap into three different colors which are blue, red, and green
  • Orange is The New Black: You use different colors to defeat enemies, and it cannot be the same one!
  • Tsunomaki Janken: It's rock paper scissors, but with colors this time
  • (Bonus) Elemental Mastery: The color scheme is inspired by characteristics of elements, imagine the connections among water, fire, and grass.
Credits
  • https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack
  • https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
  • https://opengameart.org/content/bullet-collection-1-m484
  • https://www.tumgir.com/forheksed
  • https://makotohiramatsu.itch.io/abandoned
